content.en: Replication algorithms: Researchers have explored various questions related to replication in distributed systems and how algorithms can play a role in achieving efficient replication. These questions include topics such as dynamic replication, large-scale replication management, atomicity preservation, consistency and recovery control, fault-tolerant replication, and more. The algorithms identified in the analysis include replica control algorithms, adaptive data replication algorithms, multiview access protocols, and others. These findings contribute to the development of more effective and reliable replication strategies in distributed systems.
content.da: Replikationsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål relateret til replikation i distribuerede systemer og hvordan algoritmer kan spille en rolle i at opnå effektiv replikation. Disse spørgsmål omfatter emner som dynamisk replikation, storskalet replikationsstyring, bevarelse af atomaritet, konsistens- og genoprettelseskontrol, fejltolerant replikation og mere. De algoritmer, der er identificeret i analysen, inkluderer replikkontrolalgoritmer, adaptive datareplikationsalgoritmer, multiview adgangsprotokoller og andre. Disse fund bidrager til udviklingen af mere effektive og pålidelige replikationsstrategier i distribuerede systemer.
